ComicInfo.Penciller: Nick Cardy,Adrian Gonzales,Jim Aparo,Jerry Grandenetti,Gerry Talaoc,Bill Payne
ComicInfo.Title: Introduction; A Grave Undertaking!; Heads and Tale; Death's Dread Dirge!; Happy Deathday, Sweet 16!
ComicInfo.Summary:
One night the three witches have a contest to find out who is the most evil.
One stormy night Cynthia, Mildred and Mordred find refuge in a hunter's home and are greeted by the wife who shows them her husband's exhibits which includes the hunter's head after he was killed by a rhino.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Inker: Adrian Gonzales,Jim Aparo,Jerry Grandenetti,Gerry Talaoc,Bill Payne
